definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: The absorbing amount of nutriment and laminarin from kelp by eating directly by humankind is very little.
sentences.chinese: 人直接食用海带摄取的营养物质和海带多糖的量极少。

sentences.english: The absorbing amount of nutriment and laminarin from kelp by eating directly by humankind is very little.
sentences.chinese: 人直接食用海带摄取的营养物质和海带多糖的量极少。

sentences.english: Bean curd with kelp, often eat in addition to disease.
sentences.chinese: 豆腐配海带，常吃除病害。

sentences.english: In fact, I demand nothing, I just want to get up the day after the bowl of seaweed soup.
sentences.chinese: 其实我什么也不需求，我只想那天起床后有碗海带汤。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of cell wall polysaccharide (CWP) of Thallus Laminariae (TL) on thrombosis and blood coagulation.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究海带胞壁多糖对血栓形成和血液凝固的影响。

sentences.english: Objective The functional activation of dietary fiber(DF) from Laminaria japonica and its laxative effect were studied.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究海带膳食纤维的功能活化及其通便作用。

sentences.english: Tsugumi looked at him with just a trace of fear.
sentences.chinese: 月海带有一丝害怕的感情看着他。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of laminaria hemicellulose on thrombus formation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨海带半纤维素对血栓形成的影响。

sentences.english: To elucidate the mechanisms of yeast extraction and Echlonia Kurome Okum water extraction to stimulate the growth of Escherichia coli.
sentences.chinese: 研究海带水提液和酵母提取物促大肠杆菌生长的机理。

sentences.english: Taking laminaria japonica as the sample of thin layer media, experiment of drying by convection is carried out.
sentences.chinese: 以海带作为薄层介质的试样，进行对流干燥实验。

sentences.english: They cultivated kelp off the seashore of their village.
sentences.chinese: 他们在他们村庄附近的海面上养殖海带。

sentences.english: Some species, such as brown seaweed are extremely efficient at bioaccumulation.
sentences.chinese: 某些物种，例如海带，非常容易堆积放射性物质。

sentences.english: There are also superfood supplements such as seaweeds or algae that contain a full spectrum of nutrients in their natural form.
sentences.chinese: 像海带海藻这样的超级食物，含有多种天然营养成分。

sentences.english: Accordingly, often eat kelp may help prevent and treat mammary gland hyperplasia.
sentences.chinese: 因此，经常食用海带有助于预防和治疗乳腺增生。

sentences.english: An ion-chromatographic method for the determination of sulfate group of sulfated posaccharidesfrom laminaria was described .
sentences.chinese: 建立了用离子色谱测定海带硫酸多糖硫酸根的方法。

sentences.english: A spectrophotometry method for determination of iodide in kelp without developed dye was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了不需用显色剂吸光光度法测定海带中微量碘。

definition: flavored roasted seaweed/generic term for edible seaweed/Japanese: nori
variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
